content.raw:
This is tricky to test since it needs both [gazebo pull request #735](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/735/create-spring-damper-in-joints-issue-845/diff) and [gazebo pull request #737](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/737/add-ode-gearbox/diff) built from source and sdformat built from source. I'll attach some instructions for how I built it with catkin.

I successfully roslaunched atlas_v3_irobot_hands, and when I viewed the robot in rviz, the fingers don't show up.

![atlas_v3_irobot_rviz](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/96660379/atlas_v3_irobot_rviz.png)
content.html:
This is tricky to test since it needs both gazebo pull request #735 and gazebo pull request #737 built from source and sdformat built from source. I'll attach some instructions for how I built it with catkin.

I successfully roslaunched atlas_v3_irobot_hands, and when I viewed the robot in rviz, the fingers don't show up.
